mentors.bio: Senior frontend developer with 8+ years of experience in React, Vue.js, and modern web technologies. Passionate about creating intuitive user experiences and mentoring developers.
Experienced backend developer specializing in Node.js, Python, and database design. Expert in building scalable APIs and microservices architecture.
Creative UI/UX designer with 5 years of experience in user-centered design, prototyping, and design systems. Focused on creating beautiful and functional interfaces.
DevOps engineer with 9 years of experience in CI/CD, cloud infrastructure, and automation. Expert in AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Data scientist with 6 years of experience in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization. Passionate about turning data into actionable insights.
Mobile app developer with 5 years of experience in React Native, iOS, and Android development. Focused on creating smooth, native-like mobile experiences.
Senior ML engineer with 11 years of experience in deep learning, computer vision, and natural language processing. Expert in TensorFlow and PyTorch.
Cybersecurity specialist with 7 years of experience in penetration testing, security auditing, and threat analysis. Certified ethical hacker and security consultant.
Cloud architect with 10 years of experience in designing and implementing scalable cloud solutions. Expert in AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.
Junior JavaScript developer with 2 years of experience in modern JavaScript, ES6+, and web development fundamentals. Enthusiastic about helping beginners learn.
Python developer with 4 years of experience in web development, automation, and data processing. Passionate about clean code and best practices.
Senior API developer with 9 years of experience in RESTful APIs, GraphQL, and API design patterns. Expert in building robust and scalable API solutions.
Blockchain developer with 4 years of experience in smart contracts, DeFi protocols, and cryptocurrency development. Passionate about Web3 and decentralized applications.
Game developer with 3 years of experience in Unity, C#, and game design principles. Focused on creating engaging gameplay experiences and interactive storytelling.
Senior product manager with 12 years of experience in agile methodologies, user research, and product strategy. Expert in leading cross-functional teams and delivering successful products.

courses.title: Web Development Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for modern web development

chapters.title: HTML Structure and Semantics
chapters.description: Learn proper HTML document structure and semantic elements

chapters.title: CSS Styling and Layout
chapters.description: Master CSS selectors, properties, and layout techniques

chapters.title: JavaScript Basics
chapters.description: Variables, functions, and control structures in JavaScript

chapters.title: DOM Manipulation
chapters.description: Interact with HTML elements using JavaScript

chapters.title: Responsive Design
chapters.description: Create websites that work on all device sizes

chapters.title: Web Forms and Validation
chapters.description: Build interactive forms with proper validation

courses.title: Advanced React Development
courses.description: Master React hooks, context, and advanced patterns for scalable applications

chapters.title: React Hooks Deep Dive
chapters.description: useState, useEffect, and custom hooks mastery

chapters.title: Context API and State Management
chapters.description: Global state management without Redux

chapters.title: Performance Optimization
chapters.description: React.memo, useMemo, and useCallback techniques

chapters.title: Advanced Component Patterns
chapters.description: Render props, HOCs, and compound components

chapters.title: Testing React Applications
chapters.description: Unit and integration testing with Jest and RTL

courses.title: Introduction to Python
courses.description: Start your programming journey with Python basics and practical applications

chapters.title: Python Syntax and Variables
chapters.description: Basic Python syntax, data types, and variables

chapters.title: Control Flow and Functions
chapters.description: Loops, conditionals, and function definitions

chapters.title: Data Structures in Python
chapters.description: Lists, dictionaries, sets, and tuples

chapters.title: File I/O and Exception Handling
chapters.description: Working with files and handling errors gracefully

chapters.title: Object-Oriented Programming
chapters.description: Classes, objects, and inheritance in Python

courses.title: Database Design & SQL

chapters.title: Database Fundamentals
chapters.description: RDBMS concepts, normalization, and ER diagrams

chapters.title: Basic SQL Queries
chapters.description: SELECT, WHERE, ORDER BY, and basic joins

chapters.title: Advanced SQL Operations
chapters.description: Subqueries, window functions, and complex joins

chapters.title: Database Design Patterns
chapters.description: Schema design best practices and optimization
